name: Easter Jumpy
description:
A jumper game with a lot of bunnies. And carrots. And easter eggs. And more bunnies. 

(This is just a prototype)
INSPIRATIONS:

ASSETS 
- The assets were remade using this pack as base: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qkz3kadfzoq3px1/jumper-assets.zip?dl=0

SONG

- Rap2h, from Freesound https://freesound.org/people/rap2h/sounds/151539/

CODE
- RedFoc Tutorials, from YouTube
